1)","params":{"_depositAmount":"deposit amount, in reserve token","_reserveBalance":"total reserve token balance","_reserveRatio":"reserve ratio, represented in ppm, 1-1000000","_supply":"continuous token total supply"},"returns":{"_0":"purchase return amount"}},"calculateSaleReturn(uint256,uint256,uint32,uint256)":{"details":"given a continuous token supply, reserve token balance, reserve ratio and a sell amount (in the continuous token), calculates the return for a given conversion (in the reserve token)   * Formula: Return = _reserveBalance * (1 - (1 - _sellAmount / _supply) ^ (1 / (_reserveRatio / MAX_RESERVE_RATIO)))","params":{"_reserveBalance":"total reserve token balance","_reserveRatio":"constant reserve ratio, represented in ppm, 1-1000000","_sellAmount":"sell amount, in the continuous token itself","_supply":"continuous token total supply"},"returns":{"_0":"sale return amount"}}},"title":"Bancor formula by Bancor * Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more contributor license agreements; and to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0. \""},"userdoc":{"methods":{}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/sd/Documents/GitHub/virtualmarket/contracts/BancorBondingCurve.sol":"BancorBondingCurve"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/sd/Documents/GitHub/virtualmarket/contracts/BancorBondingCurve.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2d82c3589ab8d1e2a7a1746623005ad91c47ea19d336b99fe95b1c6e9cc9e500","urls":["bzz-raw://2587280f940a9e3aac31e732b9b9bdfcc34427fd4f16bec3117fa4f69df859e6","dweb:/ipfs/QmcBvKGFx816LD7b5K4vNWDQ7mv13GVwbZWKfkwrTAbP9i"]},"/Users/sd/Documents/GitHub/virtualmarket/contracts/Power.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1d3238563cb1fdc446a5792489d8b2d8ec4e46af8747ec00edf24959f9394eed","urls":["bzz-raw://10216850f53309b3aadc0a9b0d7cf8eb8bc40cdf66d3f297d1a14dde54f9fd79","dweb:/ipfs/QmSkKbQE67PrgULX4CkSCzwTiBqN794waWNRWGyiiPgRSo"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9a9cf02622cd7a64261b10534fc3260449da25c98c9e96d1b4ae8110a20e5806","urls":["bzz-raw://2df142592d1dc267d9549049ee3317fa190d2f87eaa565f86ab05ec83f7ab8f5","dweb:/ipfs/QmSkJtcfWo7c42KnL5hho6GFxK6HRNV91XABx1P7xDtfLV"]}},"version":1}

calculatePurchaseReturn(uint256,uint256,.details: given a continuous token supply, reserve token balance, reserve ratio, and a deposit amount (in the reserve token), calculates the return for a given conversion (in the continuous token)   * Formula: Return = _supply * ((1 + _depositAmount / _reserveBalance) ^ (_reserveRatio / MAX_RESERVE_RATIO) - 1)

calculateSaleReturn(uint256,uint256,uint.details: given a continuous token supply, reserve token balance, reserve ratio and a sell amount (in the continuous token), calculates the return for a given conversion (in the reserve token)   * Formula: Return = _reserveBalance * (1 - (1 - _sellAmount / _supply) ^ (1 / (_reserveRatio / MAX_RESERVE_RATIO)))

params._reserveRatio: constant reserve ratio, represented in ppm, 1-1000000
params._sellAmount: sell amount, in the continuous token itself
